name: dagdev
description: CLI tool for DagDev - Hardhat for BlockDAG Networks

scripts.build: npm run clean && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/index.js --external:mocha --external:chai --external:@types/mocha --external:@types/chai --external:solc --external:@dagdev/runtime --external:@dagdev/core --format=cjs --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.build:exe: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-win-x64 --output dist/executables/dagdev --compress GZip

author: DagDev Team
